item.title: Queering Jane Austen In YA Literature
item.description: Read your way into some of the best recent LGBTQ+ YA retellings of Jane Austen.

item.title: “None Of These Books Are Obscene”: Judge Strikes Down Much of Florida’s Book Ban Bill
item.description: In a major win for intellectual freedom, a judge rules against Florida law that led to removing hundreds of books from school libraries.

item.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
item.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

item.title: Bookish Cardigans for Librarians and Library Enthusiasts
item.description: Bookish cardigans aren't just for librarians: any power reader will find a new wardrobe staple with these book print cardigans.

item.title: The Best Queer Romances of All Time
item.description: Here's all the latest LGBTQ+ lit news you need to know, including Rolling Stone's picks for the best queer romances of all time.
